definitions.definition: A member of a Christian contemplative order of monks founded by Bruno of Cologne (St Bruno) in 1084.
A pupil of Charterhouse School (founded in a Carthusian monastery)

main_definition: A member of a Christian contemplative order of monks founded by Bruno of Cologne (St Bruno) in 1084.
secondary_definitions: A pupil of Charterhouse School (founded in a Carthusian monastery)
